casebody.data:
No. 332,

Misc.

Ferrara v. United States. Leon B. Polsky for petitioner. Solicitor General Marshall, Assistant Attorney General Vinson, Beatrice Rosenberg and Mervyn Hamburg for the United States.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Black is of the opinion that certiorari should be granted. Mr. Justice Marshall took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
